items.name: *Calamari
items.description: A mix of tentacles and rings, lightly coated and fried, served with a side of cocktail.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: Fried jumbo chicken wings, your choice of six or twelve, tossed in one of our signature sauces: Buffalo, BBQ, Blazing BBQ, Incinerator, Garlic Parm

items.name: Club Nachos
items.description: Your choice of chicken or beef, atop warm corn tortilla chips with jalapenos, onions, and cheddar cheese.

items.name: Loaded Skins
items.description: Six halves, loaded down with cheddar cheese, bacon, and green onion with a side of sour cream.

items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Six of our breaded mozzarella sticks, fried golden and served with marinara.

items.name: Par Three Platter
items.description: A half portion of quesadilla, three mozzarella sticks, and six of our stuffed mushrooms, served with marinara, salsa, and Cajun aioli.

items.name: BBQ Pork Quesadilla
items.description: A full 12' quesadilla stuffed with smoked pork, pepperjack, onions, and jalapenos.

items.name: Loaded Quesadilla
items.description: A full 12' quesadilla loaded with peppers, onions, and chicken. Served with salsa and sour cream.

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: A plate of our baked button mushrooms stuffed with our blend of seasonings and cream cheese.

items.name: *Ahi Tuna Steak
items.description: A yellowfin tuna steak crusted with sesame and lightly seared and sliced. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: Bang Bang Tempura
items.description: Eight, battered jumbo shrimp tossed in our sweet and sour sauce. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: Fish and Chips
items.description: Two battered cod filets fried golden and served with an order of French fries and tartar sauce.

items.name: Chicken Fajitas
items.description: Two 6' flour tortillas with grilled fajita chicken, grilled peppers and onions and cotija cheese. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: Bacon Mac & Cheese
items.description: Penne pasta tossed in our home made bacon cheddar sauce.

items.name: ✓ Portobello Burger
items.description: A portobello mushroom cap seasoned and grilled, served on a seeded gluten free bun with lettuce and tomato. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: Irongate Deli
items.description: Your choice of sliced deli meat, bread or wrap, and cheese with lettuce, tomato, and onion. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: *Blackened Salmon Sandwich
items.description: A filet of north Atlantic caught salmon seared and topped with lettuce and tomato on a potato bun. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: Philly Cheesesteak
items.description: Sliced roasted steak with peppers, onions, and mushrooms, topped with provolone cheese in a footlong hoagie roll. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: JP's Club Sandwich
items.description: Black forest ham, roasted turkey, and smoked bacon with Swiss and cheddar cheeses, crisp leaf lettuce, tomato and mayo on three slices of your choice of bread.

items.name: The Italian
items.description: Ham, capicola, and pepperoni with lettuce, oil and vinegar, and banana peppers in a footlong hoagie roll. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: Buffalo Chicken Sandwich
items.description: A fried 8oz chicken breast, tossed in buffalo sauce, topped with pepperjack cheese, bacon, leaf lettuce and tomato on a potato bun. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: JP's Ace
items.description: An Angus beef hotdog topped with chili, coleslaw, mustard and diced red onions in a warmed roll. Solo or with a side.

items.name: House Salad
items.description: Fresh mixed greens with tomato, cucumber, mushrooms, onions and cheddar.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Chopped romaine tossed with parmesan, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Club Salad
items.description: Fresh mixed greens with tomato, cucumber, mushrooms, onions, cheddar, smoked ham and turkey, and bacon.

items.name: Gates Four Spinach Salad
items.description: Baby leaf spinach tossed with candied nuts, craisins, bacon, onion, blue cheese crumbles and balsamic dressing.

items.name: *Gates Four Burger
items.description: A half pound hamburger grilled with American, lettuce, onion, and tomato. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: *Big Sky Burger
items.description: Our half pound burger grilled with barbecue sauce, applewood smoked bacon, cheddar cheese, and crispy fried onions. Served with your choice of side.

items.name: *Carolina Burger
items.description: Our half pound burger grilled with chili, American cheese, coleslaw, mustard, and onions. Served with your choice of sides.
